data: SIDCO⁢(d,h,t)subscriptSIDCO𝑑ℎ𝑡\text{SIDC}_{\text{O}}(d,h,t)SIDC start_POSTSUBSCRIPT O end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_d , italic_h , italic_t )
All time periods when international market components are open.
The first wave of locking international market components at 18:00 on d−1.
The second wave of locking international market components at 22:00 on d−1.
SIDCC⁢(d,h,t)subscriptSIDCC𝑑ℎ𝑡\text{SIDC}_{\text{C}}(d,h,t)SIDC start_POSTSUBSCRIPT C end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_d , italic_h , italic_t )
Closing international market components one hour before the proposal.
SIDCL⁢(d,h,t)subscriptSIDCL𝑑ℎ𝑡\text{SIDC}_{\text{L}}(d,h,t)SIDC start_POSTSUBSCRIPT L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_d , italic_h , italic_t )
